name: Drinx
description: Drinx at Silver Legacy serves an extensive array of specialty martinis, wine, and almost any drink you can imagine. Located near the resort's entertainment venues, it's a popular pre-show and post-show gathering spot with a modern atmosphere.
shortDescription: Specialty martini bar near Silver Legacy's entertainment venues.

faqs.question: What kind of bar is Drinx?
faqs.answer: A contemporary cocktail bar with creative drinks and a modern, sleek atmosphere.

faqs.question: Is it near the entertainment venues?
faqs.answer: Yes, perfectly positioned near Silver Legacy's show venues for pre and post-show drinks.

faqs.question: Is there food?
faqs.answer: Light bar snacks are available, with full restaurants nearby in the resort.

meta.title: Drinx – Contemporary Bar at Silver Legacy | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Enjoy creative cocktails at Drinx in Silver Legacy Resort. A sleek, modern bar near the entertainment venues.

testimonials.quote: Post-round drinks at Drinx are a must. Our whole group gathered here after 18 holes and the vibe was perfect. Good cocktails, sports on the TVs, and the staff handled our large tab easily.
testimonials.author: Megan K.

testimonials.quote: Drinx has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside silver-legacy-resort-casino. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Patricia S.
